title: Adobe Technical Communication Suite 2015 Multi-XFORCE
description:
Adobe Technical Communication Suite 2015 Multi-XFORCE

Easily author bidirectional technical content and publish across mobile devices
Adobe FrameMaker (2015 release) is a complete solution for bidirectional technical documentation. Publish natively across mobile devices, formats, and platforms, and author with best-in-class XML/DITA support. Collaborate seamlessly with experts, and manage content using integration with leading CMSs.

Deliver personalized content across platforms and mobile devices
Adobe RoboHelp (2015 release) empowers you to deliver engaging help and policy content across mobile devices, formats, and platforms. Publish content as mobile apps, or in HTML5, EPUB 3, KF8, and MOBI. Help users find relevant content faster with dynamic content filters. Work more productively with a ribbon UI. 

Get all you need to create everything in eLearning
Adobe Captivate 8 software reimagines eLearning authoring for a multidevice world. Develop responsive mobile learning without programming, and leverage best-in-class HTML5 publishing to deliver content to virtually any device.

The complete PDF solution for working anywhere
Collaborate faster and smarter by creating, reviewing and editing PDFs anywhere.

Video creation was never this easy
Adobe Presenter 10 software lets you turn passive content into HD videos and publish to popular video sharing sites. Transform PowerPoint slides with assets and quizzes, and leverage HTML5 publishing to deliver to desktops and tablets. 


Official Page :- http://www.adobe.com/products/technicalcommunicationsuite.html
